ygData.subject: Re: lots of money...
ygData.msgSnippet: Woven armor is a good idea as well...though I doubt you ll be able to afford a full set for 26pp.... Also consider a decent piercing weapon...use both types
ygData.messageBody:
Woven armor is a good idea as well...though I doubt you'll be able
to afford a full set for 26pp....

Also consider a decent piercing weapon...use both types (piercing
and 2hblunt) and keep your skills up...

Spells....you never seem to have enough to buy all the spells you
need when you hit your next bracket....buy them and put them in the bank for
later...

Good luck!

Fistlebane




From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...> on 06/10/99 12:21
PM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] lots of money...

From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>

Runed totem staff. at your lvl, this would help the most probably.
